sentence: Out in Outagamie County, Wisconsin, two flights and a lengthy Lyft ride from Capitol Hill, US Senate candidate Tom Nelson follows events in Washington with disbelief as leaders of his own Democratic Party resist banning members of Congress from buying and selling stock.
author: Dave Levinthal
title: Democratic candidates blast Biden and Pelosi for not pushing Congress to pass a stock trade ban for lawmakers: 'Get in the ring!'

sentence: Mandela Barnes (D) leading that primary field with 23 percent support, with Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry trailing at 13 percent support, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson garnering five percent support and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski three percent.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Democratic group runs ad hitting Ron Johnson over Trump 2017 tax bill

sentence: Mandela Barnes (D), state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski (D), Milwaukee Bucks vice president Alex Lasry (D), Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson (D) and nonprofit executive Steven Olikara (D), among others.
author: Reid Wilson
title: Democrats reserve $33 million in fall advertising in fight for Senate

sentence: Among the candidates are Mandela Barnes, the current lieutenant governor; Alex Lasry, son to a part-owner of the Milwaukee Bucks; Sarah Godlewski, current state treasurer; and Tom Nelson, current Outagamie County executive.
author: Salena Zito
title: The tea leaves in Wisconsin look promising for Republicans
